projects.name: 25 + 5 Clock
projects.summary: A FreeCodeCamp challenge for a timer that beeps when the set session and break time each end.

projects.name: Drum Machine
projects.summary: A FreeCodeCamp challenge for a drum that can be played with either your keyboard or your mouse.

projects.name: Javascript Calculator
projects.summary: A FreeCodeCamp challenge to create a Javascript calculator.

projects.name: Local Weather App
projects.summary: A FreeCodeCamp challenge that displays the weather base on the user's location.

projects.name: Random Quote Machine
projects.summary: A FreeCodeCamp challenge for generating a random quote.

projects.name: Simple Markdown Previewer
projects.summary: A FreeCodeCamp challenge for a Markdown Previewer.

projects.name: Twitch Streamer Watchlist
projects.summary: A FreeCodeCamp challenge that display a set list Twitch streamer using a mock version of the Twitch API.

projects.name: Wikipedia Search Viewer
projects.summary: A FreeCodeCamp challenge for a page that uses Wikipedia API to search for page given a keyword and generate a random Wikipedia page.

projects.name: OpenAI Text Prompts
projects.summary: An app that generates a response given a prompt via OpenAI.
